articles.description: Higher Education Minister Blade Nzimande has appointed professor Lourens van Staden as the new administrator at the Mangosuthu University of Technology.
articles.content:
• Higher Education Minister Blade Nzimande has dissolved the council of the Mangosuthu University of Technology.
  • He appointed Lourens van Staden as the institution's administrator.
